page.title: 04Education
page.content: A school day begins at 8:55 and ends at 15:35.There are eight lessons in a day and two registration periods.The morning registration begins at 8:55 and lasts 25 minutes ending at 9:20 and the second at 15:35 lasting for 5 minutes.Two lessons follow the first registration period before a break time which lasts 15 minutes.After break there are a further three lessons before dinner.Dinner lasts for 1 hour 15 minutes.Dinner starts at 12:30 and ends at 13:45.At 13:45 another 3 lessons begin,the first being 40 minutes long,the other two lasting 35 minutes,after the registration period at 15:35 everyone returns home.During morning registration the teacher checks who is absent.during the rest of registration homework may be completed or other school work may be done.
